name: KSS-Paint Image
summary: Learn about .KSS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Bitmap images are digital graphics comprised of a matrix of dots known as pixels. KSS-Paint allows users to create small bitmap images. The program was released in 1985 and available for Atari computers.

instructions: You can open a KSS file with Piotr Fusik RECOIL (multiplatform) or Tom's Editor (Web) to view the image it contains.
You can use RECOIL or Tom's Editor to convert KSS files to more common image formats. For example, Tom's Editor can convert KSS files to the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
